jd: From: rajkumar, NITYA Software Solutions Inc. rajkumar.v@nityainc.com Reply to: rajkumar.v@nityainc.com Hi,I hope you are doing well.I am Raj from NITYA Software Solutions Inc.I've included below the job description, please let me know if you are interested, and reply with one updated resume, which I've expected.Role: Technical Project ManagerProven experience in full stack development with a focus on both frontend and backend technologiesStrong problem-solving skills, with an ability to anticipate challenges and proactively address themExperience working with mid-sized budgets and managing resources effectivelyA team player who can work independently but also understands when to seek input from othersFamiliarity with compliance and governance processes within tech-driven organizationsThank you,RajkumarEMAIL ID:rajkumar.v@nityainc.comNITYA Software Solutions Inc.
